title: Topic 004 Question 034
body: You have an Azure Stack Hub integrated system that is enabled for multi-tenancy.
You receive an alert that one or more guest Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) tenants requires updates to support new features.
You need to identify which Azure AD tenants you must update.
Which two options can you use? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
options: the App registrations blade of the public Azure portal
the User subscriptions blade of the administrator portal in Azure Stack Hub
the Directories blade of the administrator portal in Azure Stack Hub
